QuestData.Title: Slaves to No One
QuestData.Description: I was one of the few that escaped, $n. When the Forsaken took over our town and our mine, they treated us with utmost cruelty.$B$BThose of us who were weak and could not endure hard labor were worked to death by the abomination known as Brothogg.$B$BMy wife was among his victims, $c, and I swore that one day her death would be avenged. I am too frail now, but you can deliver justice... for my wife... for Gilneas!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Get rid of this... this... ABOMINATION.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Brothogg the Slavedriver inside Emberstone Mine.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. Our people will no longer suffer under that monstrosity's yoke.
